subject: Police
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Stun Guns
lead_paragraph: Jayson Williams, the former Nets star, was stunned with a Taser by the police after he resisted attempts by officers to take him to a hospital. The police were called to a hotel in lower Manhattan’s Battery Park City around 4 a.m. when a female friend reported Williams was acting suicidal. When officers arrived, the 6-foot-10, 325-pound Williams appeared drunk and agitated, the police said.
